description: Unique identifier of the source work order to which this relationship applies.
Line number for this relationship entry under the source work order; used to distinguish multiple entries.
Sequence number for ordering or grouping related entries for the same work order; exact usage may vary; confirm with SME.
Code indicating the type of related record or relationship category (e.g., work order vs. work request).
Identifier of the related work order or request referenced by this relationship.
User ID that created the relationship record.
Timestamp when the relationship record was created, in system time.
User ID that last updated the relationship record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this relationship record.
Secondary relationship type or qualifier providing additional context; likely optional and sparsely used; confirm with SME.
